keyword: how many calories is in coors light
title: How Many Calories in Coors Light?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in Coors Light per 12 oz serving, including carbs, protein, and other nutrition facts for this light beer.
h1: How Many Calories in Coors Light?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) bottle of Coors Light lager beer; values based on official or average nutritional data.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand batch, serving size, and temperature; alcohol content affects totals. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Coors Light has 102 kcal, with low carbs and minimal protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Switch to regular Coors (non-light) per bottle
Pour into a larger 16 oz glass (same volume)

faqs.q: How many calories is in one Coors Light bottle?
faqs.a: About 102 kcal in a standard 12 oz bottle.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Coors Light?
faqs.a: Approximately 5 g of carbs per 12 oz serving, mostly from malt.

faqs.q: Does Coors Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: ~1 g protein and 0 g fat per bottle.

faqs.q: How does Coors Light compare to other light beers?
faqs.a: Similar to many light beers at 90-110 kcal per 12 oz; lower than regular beers (140+ kcal).

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Coors Light?
faqs.a: Low at ~10 mg per 12 oz bottle.
